margit.bio: I shall remember thee, Tarnished. Smould'ring with thy meagre flame. Cower in fear. Of the night. The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
margit.name: - Margit to the Tarnished after being defeated, Elden Ring

godrik.bio: I command thee, kneel! I am the lord of all that is golden!
godrik.name: - Godrick the Grafted

rennela.tag: Rennela : The Queen of the Full Moon
rennela.bio: Foul trespasser. Send word far and wide. Of the last Queen of Caria, Rennala of the Full Moon. And the majesty of the night she conjureth
rennela.name: - Rannis defensive spell

radahn.bio: The Red Lion General wielded gravitational powers which he learned in Selia during his younger days. All so he would never have to abandon his beloved but scrawny steed.
radahn.name: , Remembrance of the Starscourge
